explains: adj. 模糊的，不清楚的；朦胧的；难以清楚辨认的

sentences.en: The lettering is fuzzy and indistinct.
The white of two letters in her lap grew indistinct.
sentences.cn: 她膝上那两封信的白字已模糊了。

sentences.en: A color or pattern that is relatively indistinct in one kind of light may be quite conspicuous in another.
sentences.cn: 在某种光照下相对较难辨认的颜色或式样，在另外一种光照下也许相当显眼。
